name: Avicenna Alliance -
goal:
The ASBL aims at the improvement of public health through the promotion of in-silico medicine.

The activities that enable the achievement of the objectives of the ASBL include: the promotion of policy and legislation at National and European level; engagement with policy-makers through meetings and events; the undertaking of collaborative scientific research projects furthering and supporting the objectives of the ASBL; the promotion of in-silico medicine through social media and traditional media outlets; the development of policy and communication material.
interests: Information Society, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: eHealth, Clincial Trials Regulation, EMA Regulation, Data Protection Regulation, Medical Devices Regulation, mHealth, EMA Modelling and Simulation policies
